channel.title: You Can Install Linux On The PS3
channel.description:
I Have Been Able to Install linux On My PS3 Under My Other OS And it Worked Very Well Aswell After that I Unistalled it And Installed Windows XP And It WORKS Who Said that You Cant Get Halo On The PS3 are so wrong (By Installing It) =D....I Hope I Havn't Tryed It Yet =( From Your Friendly Neigbourhood Tythus
Comments Please

item.title: You Can Install Linux On The PS3
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Ohh, I see GPU I was thinking of something like that, not specifically graphics though.

20 gigs is not enough for me I couldn’t stand it,I like the feeling of no limit(290gigs! ;D )

item.description:
@TeeBaggie wrote:

I Had A PS3, But Then My Dad Returned It So Now I’m Left Out… I Had A 20GB Though So It Kinda Suct. And Yes, Typing Like This Is Awesome. Lel, My Pinky Hurts xD. How In The World Do You Get Mac On The PS3??? I Wanna Get A 60GB And Try It

item.title: You Can Install Linux On The PS3
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:5, topic:94953”][quote author=nix link=topic=137367.msg1332681#msg1332681 date=1179458382]
Linux has limited if any access to the PS3’s GPU anyway… who would want linux on a crippled machine?
[/quote]

look at crippled lol. by what do you mean “GPU”?[/quote]
CPU = Central Processing Unit = “Intel/AMD/Etc.”; in your motherboard, and handles almost everything
GPU = Graphics Processing Unit = “ATi/nVidia/Etc.”; in your video card, and handles all graphics, e.g., Rendering on your display.

Read full topic
item.source: You Can Install Linux On The PS3
